name: Square Juggle
description:
Welcome to the Juggle! Square Juggle is a love letter to squares. You play as a square, grabbing point squares, while avoiding tons of enemy squares.

Control your square with ninja-like precision by tapping the left and right jump arrows. Grab the 4 points before time runs out, while avoiding the walls and enemy obstacles. Collect coins along the way and use them to unlock new characters in the prize drop game!

FEATURES
◉ 2 game modes: Endless and Challenges
◉ Over 20 unlockable characters, each with a unique color theme.
◉ Over 40 enemy obstacles of varying difficulty.
